name: Frown
description:
By Ivan C. and Irene L.

Frown is a game following an individual with the goal to arrive home and make it to bed. They find frowning to be their coping mechanism–a temporary solution to their problems. By switching between different states, frowning and neutral, their surroundings will reveal a different set of platforms, and reveal a different perspective on their choices. But to make their journey home, they will learn that frowning is not all there is to a solution.

Controls:
Left Arrow - Move Left
Right Arrow - Move Right
Space - Jump
Z - Toggle Frowning/Neutral
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
